name: PyPIPublisher
description: Create and upload an sdist or wheel to a PyPI-compatible index using Twine.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: PyPI service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: A generic service connection for connecting to the package index.

inputs.name: pathToPublish
inputs.label: Path to publish
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the Python package (sdist or wheel) to upload. Must be a fully qualified path or relative to the working directory.
